description:
Atlas is an easy-to-use theme manager that works alongside the styling system.


See examples at jwels.berlin/atlas

Watch a short tutorial clip on youtube.com


How it works

Styles can be put into folders in Figma. These folders are equivalent to writing forward slashes in your files. Atlas uses this convention and adds theming capabilities to it. So you can have a 'Light', 'Dark' or any other folder for your color, effect, and text styles and then switch between them.
